Boards, Commissions and Committees

* Government/
* [Boards and Committees](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/page/boards.home)

Board Links/Resources

* [Board Appointment Process](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/page/boards.appoint)
* [Convention and Civic Center Advisory Board](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/page/boards.civic)
* [Groesbeck-Maffett Memorial Library Board](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/page/boards.library)
* [Parks and Recreation Advisory Board](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/page/boards.parks)
* [Economic Development Corporation](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/page/boards.edc)
* [Fire Pension Board](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/page/boards.firepension)

The City of Groesbeck City Council depends on the input from residents serving on Boards, Commissions and Committees. Groesbeck has four kinds of Boards, Commissions and Committees. They are:

* Advisory Boards
* Decision Making Boards
* Separate Legal Entities
* Ad hoc Committees

**Advisory Boards, Commissions and Committees defined.**   
  
These Boards, Commissions and Committees advise the City Council, City Administrator and City Staff. They play a key role in keeping the City government close to the people it serves and provides ideas, feedback and suggestions and may serve as a sounding board for proposed policy. These particular Boards, Commissions and Committees include:

* Convention and Civic Center Advisory Board
* Groesbeck-Maffett Public Library Board
* Parks and Recreation Advisory Board

**Separate Legal Entities defined.**  
These are boards that are recognized by the State as separate legal entities with their own Articles of Incorporation and By-Laws, registered with the office of the Secretary of State, created by an act of the State Legislature and recognized as a separate governmental entity. These Boards include:

* Groesbeck Economic Development Corporation
* Fire Pension Board

Groesbeck Texas - A Great Place to Live, Play, and Work
